teaser: The president made a big speech about his economic growth plans. He used the phrase 'middle class' more than 20 times. As the low-paid service sector grows and the old middle class shrinks -- can the “middle out” approach help service workers? And American companies have helped employ more U.S. military veterans in the past few years.
title: Marketplace for 7/24/13 - Middle out
description: The president made a big speech about his economic growth plans. He used the phrase 'middle class' more than 20 times. As the low-paid service sector grows and the old middle class shrinks -- can the “middle out” approach help service workers? And American companies have helped employ more U.S. military veterans in the past few years.
byline: Mitchell Hartman, David Weinberg, Sabri Ben-Achour, Afi-Odelia Scruggs, Kai Ryssdal, Shannon Mullen and Queena Kim
